Articles.Content:
Here's "Thunder Thighs" - the thinking man's SSTO...

(In celebration of the de-nerf of the KR-2L+ in 1.0.4.)

![MxEedNq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MxEedNq.jpg)

![D8IM17Z.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/D8IM17Z.jpg)

![py01B10.png](http://i.imgur.com/py01B10.png)

Craft file: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/4ubv94jq4i7kwdn/Dumb%201.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/4ubv94jq4i7kwdn/Dumb%201.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-25T20:59:34Z" title="06/25/2015 08:59  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 25, 2015</time> by Foxster**

LMFAO ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

This got me rolling man, good work!

Who needs this "Air-ee-oh-die-nam-ics" anyways? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Stay Kerbal, my friend.
This is ridiculous. I LOVE IT!
Spaceballs One has become... \*drumroll\* Mega Maid.
Now *that's* what I call a Rocket Man!
One of the few genuinely funny things I've seen on these forums :>
Fat bottomed girls they make the rockin' um, err "rocket" world go round! - "Kueen" oh dear I made another k for kerbal joke
